data.title: Wells Fargo Total Assets 2010-2024 | WFC
data.meta_description:
Wells Fargo total assets from 2010 to 2024. Total assets can be defined as the sum of all assets on a company's balance sheet.
  • Wells Fargo total assets for the quarter ending June 30, 2024 were $1,940.073B, a 3.4% increase year-over-year.
  • Wells Fargo total assets for 2023 were $1932.468B, a 2.74% increase from 2022.
  • Wells Fargo total assets for 2022 were $1881.02B, a 3.44% decline from 2021.
  • Wells Fargo total assets for 2021 were $1948.068B, a 0.25% decline from 2020.
